paragraph.value: For similarity tasks, cross-sentential contexts do not seem useful, and can even be detrimental for window sizes. However, for analogy tasks, crosssentential contexts lead to

results thanks to the increased it provides. This is especially pronounced for corpora with sentences such as OpenSubtitles (see Table 3).
